data.comment: In the minute -1, A total of 6247 spectators is reported.
The big names in today's match at RZD Arena have now been confirmed.
The match has started at RZD Arena.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
In the minute 4, Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Krasnodar drives forward and Daniil Utkin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Cristian Ramirez (Krasnodar) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at RZD Arena.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Grzegorz Krychowiak (Lokomotiv Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Krasnodar are coming forward and Cristian Ramirez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 15, Kirill Levnikov awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
At RZD Arena, Krasnodar are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in Krasnodar.
In the minute 19, Lokomotiv Moscow pushes forward through Aleksey Miranchuk, whose finish on goal is saved.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Dmitry Rybchinskiy gets in a shot on goal at RZD Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Moscow, Remy Cabella of Krasnodar is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 21, Kirill Levnikov awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 24, Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rifat Zhemaletdinov of Lokomotiv Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Dmitry Rybchinskiy is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Vedran Corluka (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
Cristian Ramirez for Krasnodar is whistled offside.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kristoffer Olsson of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
In the minute 40, Krasnodar are in shooting range from this free kick.
Daniil Utkin (Krasnodar) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In the minute 42, Krasnodar's Aleksandr Martynovich attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
In the minute 43, Lokomotiv Moscow take a 1-0 lead thanks to Aleksey Miranchuk.
Great play from Dmitrii Zhivoglyadov to set up the goal.
Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 45, Kirill Levnikov awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Wanderson (Krasnodar) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second half has started at RZD Arena.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Lokomotiv Moscow in Moscow.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kirill Levnikov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Lokomotiv Moscow's Dmitry Rybchinskiy is on target but unsuccessful.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
In the minute 51, Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Free kick Krasnodar.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Can Krasnodar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
Throw-in for Krasnodar at RZD Arena.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow close to the penalty box.
Lokomotiv Moscow drive upfield and Aleksey Miranchuk gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Krasnodar defender.
In the minute 57, Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Krasnodar needs to be cautious. Lokomotiv Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Krasnodar.
In the minute 61, Fedor Smolov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lokomotiv Moscow.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Stanislav Magkeev is on a sub for Dmitry Rybchinskiy for Lokomotiv Moscow.
Shapi Suleymanov is replacing Daniil Utkin for the away team.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Kirill Levnikov awards the home team a throw-in.
Krasnodar make their second substitution with Igor Smolnikov replacing Cristian Ramirez.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
In the minute 72, Lokomotiv Moscow are pushing forward but Fedor Smolov's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at RZD Arena.
Kirill Levnikov awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
In the minute 75, Wanderson for Krasnodar drives towards goal at RZD Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 77, Krasnodar's Remy Cabella misses with an attempt on goal.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, The away team replace Yuri Gazinskiy with Alex Matsukatov.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
In the minute 79, Krasnodar's Wanderson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at RZD Arena.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
Guilherme for Lokomotiv Moscow has been booked by Kirill Levnikov and receives a first yellow card.
Fedor Smolov (Lokomotiv Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 86, Kirill Levnikov signals a throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow, close to Krasnodar's area.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 89, Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Vitali Lisakovich is replacing Fedor Smolov for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lokomotiv Moscow drives forward and Vitali Lisakovich gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow push forward at RZD Arena and Dmitri Barinov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Krasnodar defence.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Krasnodar are pushing forward but Marcus Berg's finish is wide of the goal.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kirill Levnikov awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
Marko Nikolic (Lokomotiv Moscow) is making a third substitution, with Anton Miranchuk replacing Aleksey Miranchuk.
